Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to an earlier sick customer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to an earlier sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
